description: This file defines an audio context provider for a React application, enabling components to play sound effects and music using the Howler library. It includes context setup, stub implementations for audio controls, and a custom hook for consuming the context.

methods.name: AudioProvider
methods.description: React component that provides audio control functions to its children through context.

methods.name: useAudio
methods.description: Custom hook to access the audio context with functions for playing and stopping sound.
